summary: Adds a new Standalone Male Healer.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff]Thank you for seeing. [/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]03032015[/b][/size][/color]
I changed his head scale. It got bigger.
I hope you like it.

[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/2/0/20fce175.png[/img]

[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]ABOUT THIS MOD____[/b][/size][/color]

This mod adds a new Standalone Male follower. You can find he [color=#9fc5e8]the Frozen hearth inn in Winter hold[/color].
He uses the magic, [color=#b4a7d6]Lightningbolt[/color], [color=#b4a7d6]Paralyze[/color],[color=#b4a7d6] Conjure [/color]and [color=#b4a7d6]Heal[/color].
[color=#f9cb9c][size=3]His staff heals Player and Followers[/size][/color]. If You do not want him to heal, Please take a staff away from him.
He is[color=#ff00ff] marriageable[/color] and [color=#ff00ff]essential[/color].

[color=#ff0000][size=3]! Standalone Face Only ![/size][/color]
Please use the favorite Male's Body MOD for him.

Name: Lui
Sex: Male
Combat style: Mage and Healer
Level: min 10 to max 100
Perk: Light Foot, Silent Roll, Stealth and Other


[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Credit____[/size][/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]

Thanks a lot!!
